(3 chayarupaya) thunwana thana dina gaththe amarikawe ilinoishi neparwil chayarupa shilpiyaku wu soliyas gajis ge gembaimakunu shishuwakuge chayarupayak. (4 chayarupaya) siw wani dina gaththe thurthiye kan tansar idiripath kala monara pilaka ratawak. (5 chayarupaya) pas wana thana dina gaththe hawanghi aacharya tesa monteguge makuluwakuge kalalayaka chayarupayayi.

ebawin pasugiya kalaye mahajana mudal wancha kala, mulya aparadha ha wenath aparadhawalata sambandha aya pilibandawa karana parikshana ha naithika katayuthu durwala kirimata katayuthu nokarana lesath thawamath parikshana patan gena nathi eheth mulya wancha ha aparadhawalata sambandha siyalu dena pilibandawa da parikshana kadinam karana lesath janawaramata garu karana lesath api aanduwata bala kara sitimu.

"kalu janawariya” lesa nam keruna madhyawedinge udghoshanaye aramuna wuye rajapaksha aanduwa yatathe 2006 sita 2010 dakwa sama janawari masayaka sidu keri athi madhyawedin ghathanaya kirima, pahara gena gos athurudahan kirima ha aanduwe pitubalaya yatathe madhya aayathanawalata pa්rahara ella kirimata wirodhaya pama ya. 2005 rajapaksha balayata pathwimen pasu pa්raharayata lakwu pa්rathama madhyawediya wuye, sudar oli patha්raye suba්ramaniyam sugirdharajan ya.
